argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sitgval.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | sitgval.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 3 |  | sitgval.s | |- S = ( sigaGen ` J ) |
| 4 |  | sitgval.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 5 |  | sitgval.x | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 6 |  | sitgval.h | |- H = ( RRHom ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 7 |  | sitgval.1 | |- ( ph -> W e. V ) |
| 8 |  | sitgval.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. U. ran measures ) |
| 9 |  | sibfmbl.1 | |- ( ph -> F e. dom ( W sitg M ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dmmeas | |- ( M e. U. ran measures -> dom M e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom M e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( TopOpen ` W ) e. _V |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` W ) e. _V ) |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> J e. _V ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_sgsiga | |- ( ph -> ( sigaGen ` J ) e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 16 | 3, 15 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ph -> S e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_sibfmbl | |- ( ph -> F e. ( dom M MblFnM S ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 16, 17 | #P_mbfmf | |- ( ph -> F : U. dom M --> U. S ) |
| 19 | 3 | #P_unieqi | |- U. S = U. ( sigaGen ` J ) |
| 20 |  | #P_unisg | |- ( J e. _V -> U. ( sigaGen ` J ) = U. J ) |
| 21 | 14, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> U. ( sigaGen ` J ) = U. J ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> U. S = U. J ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_feq3d | |- ( ph -> ( F : U. dom M --> U. S <-> F : U. dom M --> U. J ) ) |
| 24 | 18, 23 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> F : U. dom M --> U. J ) |
